ISSUE.TITLE: Performance optimization for many products tags
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 When you have a lot of products tags (e.g. 23K records), then the category details page could load up to 5 seconds and the product details page around 3 seconds. If you disable product tags (e.g. do not invoke the "ProductTagCountLoadAll"), then everything works fast Tested with catalog of around 3K products and 23K product tags Also see: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/5117 (possible solution), https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/4753 (then test with a lot of specification attributes, but I don't think it really matters)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4980 Code refactoring to improve performance of getting product tags
#4980 #5133 Improved performance when too many hidden entries
